meta.title: हलायुधकोशः (अभिधानरत्नमाला)
meta.author: हलायुध
meta.publisher: विनोद चन्द्र पाण्डेय, निदेशक, उत्तर प्रदेश हिन्दी संस्थान, राजर्षि पुरुषोत्तमदास टण्डन हिन्दी भवन, महात्मा गांधी मार्ग, लखनउ - २२६००१
meta.pressDetails: शिवम् प्रिन्टर्स, सी. २७/२७३, इण्डियन प्रेस कोलोनी, मलदहिया, वाराणसी - २२१००२
meta.projectDetails: This project is aimed at creating a database and related software tools to access Indian koshas, both online and offline. The project is funded by generous donation of Shree Ramkrishna Knowledge Fondation, Surat.
meta.credits: 1. SRKKF for funding. 2. www.archive.org for providing us the scanned book to digitize. 3. Dr. Dhaval Patel for spending time to proofread the data.
